name: data-structures-algorithms
description: improve data structure and algorithm knowledge

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:ts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:ts
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run webpack && npm run generate-report
scripts.dev2: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run webpack && npm run generate-report2
scripts.coverage: npm run generate-report && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && codecov
scripts.generate-report: nyc --report-dir coverage npm run test && nyc report --reporter=text
scripts.go: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
